channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Jules Hudson is house hunting in Somerset with a couple who have a ?675,000 budget to find a rural home that must have annexe potential for their parents. During his time in the county, Jules visits the Royal Navy's Fleet Air Arm Museum where he gets up close and personal with an ambitious project to rebuild a Second World War aircraft using reclaimed parts.
